Views¶

class gallery.views.CropImageMixin[source]¶

Provieds cropping methods.

crop_photo(photo)[source]¶

Crops photo according to data stored in POST (uses ‘coords’ key)

is_crop(request)[source]¶

Return True if request seems to be crop request.

class gallery.views.PhotoAddFormView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Shows form for adding new photo

form_class¶

alias of PhotoAddForm

model¶

alias of Photo

class gallery.views.PhotoEditFormView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Provieds basic photo editing options, also handles crop requests. On successful edit returns to gallery view.

form_class¶

alias of PhotoEditForm

get_queryset()[source]¶

Filter by logged in user

get_success_url()[source]¶

Return to gallery on success

class gallery.views.UserGallery(**kwargs)[source]¶

Shows user’s public gallery

class gallery.views.UserOwnGallery(**kwargs)[source]¶

Shows currently logged in user his/her gallery. Private photos are shown as well.
